name: Right Neck Stretch
how_to_perform:
1. Slowly tilt your head to the right, keeping your chin parallel to the ground.
2. Gently place your right hand on your left shoulder for support and focus on stretching the muscles in the side of your neck.

3. Hold this position for a few seconds, breathing normally.

4. Release back to a neutral position.
short_summary: Right Neck Stretch is an exercise that helps stretch the muscles on one side of the neck.
